channel.title: Self help on Dheepak's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Self help on Dheepak's blog

item.title: Why We Sleep: Unlocking the Power of Sleep and Dreams
item.description: During an interview in my early days of career HR asked me how I manage day-to-day pressure that I face. I answered that I’ll doze off and manage to move on from previous day’s not-so-pleasant events. I told this anecdote whenever someone makes fun of my sleepiness. Lo and behold this book shone light on events happening inside the cranium while we sleep, and states that we do able to handle emotions and bad memories through good night’s sleep.

item.title: The Most Important Thing: Uncommon Sense for The Thoughtful Investor
item.description: Book Name Author Subject Area Pages The Most Important Thing: Uncommon Sense for The Thoughtful Investor Howard S. Marks Investment 196 About author Howard Marks is an American investor, associated with Oaktree Capital Management, the largest investor in distressed securities worldwide. His memos are popular among investors community Second-level thinking Successful investing requires thoughtful attention to many separate aspects, all at the same time.
